siteMetadata.title: Product Hunt 热门
siteMetadata.author: Buzzing.cc
siteMetadata.description: 用中文浏览 Product Hunt 热门App，网站和产品

blogPost.excerpt: Tunnels is a text-based "Choose-your-own-ending" game set in a world post-apocalypse. --- It contains: - 21 hand-drawn illustrations - 9 main story endings - 3 unlockable side stories, each with 3 different endings --- Collect them all!
blogPost.body: Tunnels is a text-based "Choose-your-own-ending" game set in a world post-apocalypse. --- It contains: - 21 hand-drawn illustrations - 9 main story endings - 3 unlockable side stories, each with 3 different endings --- Collect them all!
blogPost.title: Tunnels - An apocalyptic choose-your-own-ending game
blogPost.author: Bryan Ho

localize.description: 隧道是一款以文本为基础的“选择你自己的结局”的游戏，背景设定在世界末日之后的世界。-它包含：-21幅手绘插图-9个主要故事结尾-3个可解锁的次要故事，每个故事有3个不同的结局-收集它们！
localize.tagline: 一场末日般的自主选择结局的游戏

localize.description: 隧道是一款以文本爲基礎的“選擇你自己的結局”的遊戲，背景設定在世界末日之後的世界。-它包含：-21幅手繪插圖-9個主要故事結尾-3個可解鎖的次要故事，每個故事有3個不同的結局-收集它們！
localize.tagline: 一場末日般的自主選擇結局的遊戲

previous.excerpt: Finally, a flashcard app that just works—for iOS and macOS. Thoughtfully designed, Fresh Cards is a joy to use. Using a swipe interface, card review is quick and best of all, cards are auto-scheduled for review again based on how well you did.
previous.title: Fresh Cards - Flashcards that just work

localize.description: 最后，一款适用于iOS和MacOS的闪存卡应用程序。设计周到的新卡使用起来是一件令人愉悦的事情。使用刷卡界面，卡片审查速度很快，最棒的是，卡片会根据您的表现自动安排再次审查。
最後，一款適用於iOS和MacOS的閃存卡應用程序。設計周到的新卡使用起來是一件令人愉悅的事情。使用刷卡界面，卡片審查速度很快，最棒的是，卡片會根據您的表現自動安排再次審查。

next.excerpt: Gumdrop is a matchmaking community that values more than just looks. Go beyond text & pictures and discover people you vibe with on more than just a surface level. Come join the invite-only matchmaking movement. After all, it's who you are that counts.
next.title: Gumdrop - Find your happy match.

localize.description: 口香糖是一个相亲社区，它看重的不仅仅是外表。超越文字和图片，发现你与之共鸣的人，而不仅仅是表面上的。来加入仅限受邀参加的婚介活动吧。毕竟，你是谁才是最重要的。
口香糖是一個相親社區，它看重的不僅僅是外表。超越文字和圖片，發現你與之共鳴的人，而不僅僅是表面上的。來加入僅限受邀參加的婚介活動吧。畢竟，你是誰纔是最重要的。
